org.fosstrak.reader.rprm.core.msg
Interface MessageParser

All Known Implementing Classes:
TextMessageParser, XmlMessageParser
public interface MessageParser

A MessageParser parses a messages into the intermediate representation (IR) used by the CommandDispatcher. As input into the parser serves a String, the output is a Command.

Author:
Andreas Fürer, ETH Zurich Switzerland, Winter 2005/06
